attributes.action: Ensure that all stocks of Vitamin B12 are made available to the Prime Minister to try to halt and/or reverse the apparent state of his faculties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The latest research indicates that there is a statistically significant relationship between the lower standard Vitamin B12 levels and the problems associated with memory loss and dementia.  Mr Brown has shown such memory loss in being unable to remember the promises he made before tripping into the position of Prime Minister and indeed before being appointed as Chancellor by the erstwhile holder of that office who set such an outstanding example of being unable to remember his pre-election promises.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
